name: Axis Football 2018
description: Axis Football is an American football simulation featuring a deep Franchise Mode and full customization.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10.1 compatible 1 GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
